completedMatching.name: Disney
completedMatching.description:
Disney is amplifying the impact of teachers who rally support for their classroom projects. Any teacher who posts a new project has seven days to inspire friends and family to donate to their classrooms, and Disney will match that generosity. Details for teachers.

About Disney:
We believe that if you can dream it, you can do it. Our goal is to motivate generations of kids to harness the power of creativity to help improve their communities. The world's next great artists, innovators, athletes, engineers, architects, zoologists and dreamers are out there. Disney is thrilled to play a role in supporting teachers while providing kids with the tools they need to learn, thrive and create the future they imagine. By inspiring creativity in young people today, we hope to ignite the spark of innovation that will lead us all to a brighter tomorrow. Learn more about Disney's Citizenship efforts.

matchingFund.name: The Community Foundation of New Jersey
matchingFund.description:
You can bring this project to life for less than $100!

Thanks to funding from the Community Foundation of New Jersey, this project is "Almost Home!" The Community Foundation of New Jersey will fund most of this project if someone like you provides the remainder. By completing this project you will leverage the impact of your donation.

See all projects eligible for this Double Your Impact offer.

Established in 1979, the Community Foundation of New Jersey is an alliance of families, businesses and foundations that work together to create lasting differences in people's lives and communities. Our mission is to support charitable giving that is inspired by our donors, targeted at making our communities stronger, driven by creative solutions, and effective in achieving lasting change. We have a network of affiliates in Newark, Mercer, Monmouth and Morris Counties, and in South Jersey. Through a combination of Legacy Funds and Donor Advised Funds, the foundation has granted an average of more than $25 million each year to charitable organizations and currently stewards over $250 million in charitable assets for current needs and future challenges.

matchingFund.name: Burroughs and Chapin Family Fund Foundation
matchingFund.description:
You can bring this project to life at half the cost!

The Burroughs and Chapin Family Fund will fund 50% of this project if someone like you provides the remainder. By completing this project, you will double the impact of your donation.

Utilizing the "Double Your Impact" matching program, all qualifying Horry County, SC literacy, math, science, and gardening projects will have an opportunity for half-funding by the Burroughs and Chapin Family Fund. Citizen philanthropists are needed to make the remaining donations to these projects. By making donations in conjunction with this "Double Your Impact" matching offer, the impact of your contribution is significantly increased.

The Burroughs and Chapin Family Fund is excited and proud to partner with Donors Choose to enhance Horry County, SC schools. We believe every child should have the tools necessary for success in the classroom.

The Burroughs and Chapin Family Fund is grateful to Burroughs and Chapin Company, Inc. for providing the funding for this partnership with Donors Choose.

www.burroughschapin.com

See all projects eligible for this match offer.

proposals.shortDescription: 'Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited to all we now know and understand, while imagination embraces the entire world, and all there ever will be to know and...

completedMatching.name: Disney
completedMatching.description:
Disney is amplifying the impact of teachers who rally support for their classroom projects. Any teacher who posts a new project has seven days to inspire friends and family to donate to their classrooms, and Disney will match that generosity. Details for teachers.

About Disney:
We believe that if you can dream it, you can do it. Our goal is to motivate generations of kids to harness the power of creativity to help improve their communities. The world's next great artists, innovators, athletes, engineers, architects, zoologists and dreamers are out there. Disney is thrilled to play a role in supporting teachers while providing kids with the tools they need to learn, thrive and create the future they imagine. By inspiring creativity in young people today, we hope to ignite the spark of innovation that will lead us all to a brighter tomorrow. Learn more about Disney's Citizenship efforts.

matchingFund.name: The Walt Disney Company
matchingFund.description:
You can bring this project to life at half the cost!

Disney will fund 50% of this project if someone like you provides the remainder. By completing this project, you will double the impact of your donation.

Disney is committed to conserving nature and to nurturing critical creative thinking for future generations. We hope to help kids develop life-long conservation values through nature exploration, while promoting learning that encourages play and imagination across disciplines. We are excited to support DonorsChoose.org to help educators continue to activate their classrooms through exciting and imaginative environmental projects. By leading your students toward environmental education, you can motivate them to learn about science, conservation, creative critical thinking and teamwork while teaching concepts customized to your region's education Content Standards or Guidelines. Students are empowered to think and act environmentally at school, at home and in the community.

See all projects eligible for this match offer.
